About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Wed and Fri 9am-4:30pm; Tues and Thurs 9am-7:30pm; closed Christmas -New Year period and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Written requests for local history research accepted - Donation essential.

About.Acquisition focus: Local history of Burra and District.

About.Major holdings: Ian Auhl: Indexes and copies of articles 1840-1870 (3m); Photographs 1840s- . Burra Record 1877-1977. Burra Community School: School registers 1877- . Burra District Council: Cemetery registers 1840- ; Bibliography of Obituaries 1877-1977. Registers Births 1848-1906. Deaths 1848-1967. Marriages 1848-1916. Index of Marriages and Births from Burra Record from 1876-1977.
